backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no backend logic.
feature_evidence.json: Defines feature evidence metadata listing features, affected files, components, tests, and confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing human‑written summaries for multiple frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind base styles and OKLCH color variables for light/dark themes, plus shared element styling.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML template mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component rendering the hero, 3D scene, gift messages, photo gallery, and handling background audio playback.
React Three Fiber 3D scene with floating gift boxes, confetti particles, sparkles, and auto‑rotating camera controls.
frontend/src/components/GiftRevealMessag: Interactive gift card list that expands to reveal birthday messages with animations and icons.
frontend/src/components/PhotosSection.ts: Photo gallery with preloaded images, uploads, swipe navigation, slider UI, and fallback handling for failed images.
frontend/src/content/birthdayMessages.ts: Exports an array of three birthday and friendship message strings.
frontend/src/content/preloadedPhotos.ts: Exports an array of static image paths for the six preloaded gallery photos.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates a backend actor tied to the user’s identity and refreshes dependent React Query data when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity login state, stored identity loading, and AuthClient setup through a React context provider.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file for backend-related React Query hooks; currently unused.
frontend/src/hooks/useSwipe.ts: Implements touch-based swipe detection and fires directional callbacks when swipe thresholds are met.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and a birthday-themed color palette with custom utilities and components.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with birthday-themed color tokens, animations, plugins, and extended design settings.
project_state.json: Describes project goals, issues, and feature requests focused on fixing static asset loading and enabling background music.
